greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = a(n - 1)*a(n - 2) + a(n - 2)*a(n - 3) + a(n - 1)*a(n - 3).
comment: Essentially the same as A074047. [From _R. J. Mathar_, Aug 07 2008]
results.author: _Roger L. Bagula_, Aug 30 2006
ext: Edited by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Oct 08 2006
Extended the sequence by prefixing the two values a(0)=a(-1)=1. - _M. F. Hasler_, Jan 01 2013
